channel.title: comparison on A Blog about ConTeXt
channel.description: Recent content in comparison on A Blog about ConTeXt

item.title: Need for speed
item.description: I remember that when I start using ConTeXt almost 20 years ago, one of the annoyances with ConTeXt was that compilation was slower compared to LaTeX. I regularly use both LaTeX and ConTeXt, and these days both are comparable.
